scripts.prereport: npm run delete:reports; npm run delete:screenshots; npm run delete:dockerreports
scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cy:run:docker: npm run prereport; npm run cy:run:suite1; npm run cy:run:suite2; npm run junit-merge; npm run mochawesome-merge
scripts.cy:run: npm run prereport; npm run cy:run:suite1 & npm run cy:run:suite2; npm run junit-merge; npm run mochawesome-merge
